dia.str: Thank you, young man. I have been like this for many years. Now I can have my revenge!
An old lunatic mage did this to me. He cursed me and seduced my lovely wife.
His name is Lee. Now that I can speak again I will find him and give him what he deserves.
What are you going to do?

Curse him, of course. Killing him wouldn't be enough of a punishment. I've thought about this for so long. At first I wanted to turn him into a pig, but someone might slaughter him then. I want him to suffer for decades. I'm going to turn him into a rat. A big fat smelly rat, the like he really is.
You would do the same. He took my freedom and took my wife.
